topic.title: VIABLE TUMOUR EVIDENCE AT RESECTION MARGIN
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether there is evidence of a viable Tumour at the resection margin (the margin of apparently non-tumerous TISSUE around a Tumour that has been surgically removed) during a Cancer Care Spell.
